Title: Authorizes certain injured employees or their legal representative to claim workers' compensation or to maintain an action in the courts for damages on account of such injury
Summary: Authorizes certain injured employees or their legal representative to claim workers' compensation or to maintain an action in the courts for damages on account of such injury when the commissioner of labor fails to act within a certain time frame for certain violations.
LawCode: Amd ยง11, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to protecting the right of action for workers
